scalamojo-maven-plugin

The scalamojo-maven-plugin is an extension of the maven-plugin-plugin plugin report to decorate mojo descriptors extracted by the Maven Plugin Tool for Annotations with additional mojo and parameter details extracted from scaladoc: description, @since, @deprecated.

If there are problems please let me know.

Requirements

  • Maven 3.0
  • JDK 1.5
  • No need to install scala !

Thanks to David Bernard and the team responsible for the scala-maven-plugin, which I use to compile all my maven plugins and whose generated maven site structure I lifted completely for my own use.
